channel.title: Changing weapon requirements need help!?
channel.description: [b][i]hello people, i have my own server yeeah? now i was wondering if i could change weapon requirements, well say a draggon dagger is level 60atack to wield, is there anyway i could lower it by any chance? please reply thankyou very much x[/i][/b]

item.title: Changing weapon requirements need help!?
item.dc:creator: @Defile_Pker Defile_Pker
item.description:
@Defile_Pker wrote:

ok man here is what i got so far.
Go into the server files and scroll down to the bottem. should say “wearing”
look through there and find dragon daggers or “dragon”. i tried searching it but, it doesn’t pop up.
It might cange it for all dragon weapons though.

} else if (ItemName.startsWith(“Dragon”)) {
return 60; <-- this right here should do it.

If you now anything on customs help me out

Read full topic
